definition: to gang up/to fool around with/to make up to
see 勾當|勾当[gou4 dang4]
surname Gou
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]

sentences.english: Now I'm the girl he cheats on his girlfriend with.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他揹着他女朋友跟我勾勾搭搭。

sentences.english: She was tarting round with some guys.
sentences.chinese: 她在跟幾個傢伙勾勾搭搭。

sentences.english: Senators and congressmen play footsie (with each other) while the situation gets steadily worse.
sentences.chinese: 參議員和國會議員私下勾搭，形勢越來越壞。

sentences.english: I only hooked up with him a week ago.
sentences.chinese: 我一週前才和他勾搭上的。

sentences.english: She hooked up with one of the city's typically eligible bachelors .
sentences.chinese: 她勾搭上了城裏的黃金王老五。
這四個壞傢伙勾搭上了。

sentences.english: I always have to meet her before she hooks up with this Rodolphe character.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠得在她和魯道夫那角色勾搭上之前和她碰面。

sentences.english: I have known him since childhood, until he began consorting with the dwarves.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知從他小時候，直到他勾搭上那些矮人。

sentences.english: I knew him since childhood, until he began consorting with the dwarves.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知從他小時候，直到他勾搭上那些矮人。

sentences.english: You gain the ability to potentially meet girls anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 你會獲得隨時隨地與妹子們勾搭的能力。

sentences.english: Golz should be in such obvious communication with the fascists.
sentences.chinese: 戈爾茲竟然和法西斯分子這樣明目張膽地勾勾搭搭。

sentences.english: And cut out the rituals linked to your bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 切斷可能與壞習慣“勾搭”的日常行爲。

sentences.english: Not to metion, I saw her throwing herself all over Tyler.
sentences.chinese: 更不用說，我還看見她和泰勒勾勾搭搭的。

sentences.english: In his early twenties he took Ada, a vulgar shop girl, for his mistress.
sentences.chinese: 他二十歲出頭就勾搭上粗俗的女店員阿達做他的情婦。

sentences.english: Her husband is carrying on with the woman next door.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫和隔壁那個女人勾勾搭搭的。

definition: to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
to seduce/to tempt
to make hanky-panky/to seduce women
to hit on someone/to strike up a conversation/to start talking to end an awkward silence or embarrassing situation
married man
married woman
(slang) to hook up for a one night stand/booty call
loose woman/slut
to provide for/to keep (a mistress)
to flirt
lover/mistress
to hang around/to fool around/to live aimlessly
to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
to make a mess/to mess with/to be wild/to sleep around/to jump into bed
lit. eyes and eyebrows come and go (idiom); to make eyes/to exchange flirting glances with sb
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
